name: Freminet
desc:
"Yearning for Unseen Depths" Freminet

Alone under the cold light of stars.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> . If this character has not yet gained <color=#ffffff>Pers Timer</color> , they will gain <color=#ffffff>Pers Timer</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Pers Timer</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>For every 1 card you draw:</color> This card will gain 1 <color=#ffffff>Pressure Level</color> .
<color=#ffffff>When the attached character uses Pressurized Floe:</color> If <color=#ffffff>Pressure Level</color> is at least 2, cancel this effect, and the Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die. If, after the Skill is finalized, the Pressure Level is at least 4, deal 2 additional <color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> .

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> . Attaches <color=#ffffff>Subnautical Hunter Mode</color> to this character.
<color=#ece5d8>Subnautical Hunter Mode</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>After you draw 3 cards:</color> Grants 1 <color=#ffffff>Shield</color> point to defend the attached character. (Can stack. Max 2 points.)
<color=#ffffff>After the attached character uses a Normal Attack or Elemental Skill:</color> Place up to 2 cards with the highest Elemental Dice Cost in your Hand at the bottom of your deck, then draw the same number of cards.
<color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds): 2</color>

Applies Cryo and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG+1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Shield</color>
This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.
<color=#ece5d8>Duration (Rounds)</color>
Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.
This card will be discarded immediately once <color=#ffffff>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

customize.name: Freminet
customize.desc:
"Yearning for Unseen Depths" Freminet

Alone under the cold light of stars.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"You... want a game of cards, with me? I... hope the experience of playing together brings you satisfaction."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Freminet's deck centers around inserting cards into the deck, with a large amount of "draw card" effects to help him quickly obtain powerful cards.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Freminet
customize.desc:
"Yearning for Unseen Depths" Freminet

Alone under the cold light of stars.

customize.name: Lyney
customize.desc:
"Spectacle of Phantasmagoria" Lyney

Those flowers in the mirror... who are they for?

customize.name: Lynette
customize.desc:
"Elegance in the Shadows" Lynette

The firmament glimpsed in a reflected moon.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Freminet
customize.desc:
"Yearning for Unseen Depths" Freminet

Alone under the cold light of stars.

customize.name: Moment of Waking and Resolve
customize.desc:
Freminet: Moment of Waking and Resolve

"Going under."

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Moment of Waking and Resolve
customize.desc:
Freminet: Moment of Waking and Resolve

"Going under."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I'm sorry, that must not have been very satisfying. I don't think I was a strong enough opponent for you. I'll try again, just... harder this time."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Freminet" starts with the Talent Card "Moment of Waking and Resolve" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.desc:

Alone under the cold light of stars.

customize.name: Lyney
customize.desc:
"Spectacle of Phantasmagoria" Lyney

Those flowers in the mirror... who are they for?

customize.name: Lynette
customize.desc:

The firmament glimpsed in a reflected moon.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffffd9>Prerequisite</color>
Reach Player Level 7
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Freminet: Friendly

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

value.name: Moment of Waking and Resolve
value.desc:
Freminet: Moment of Waking and Resolve

"Going under."

value.text: Reward for inviting Freminet to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

value.name: Freminet
value.desc: A reserved young man who is well-versed in diving. Beneath his distant, icy demeanor lies a pure heart bereft of all flaws.
